message.body: I got into the fafsa info and confirmed she did include McGill in the list of colleges. So I have to ask McGill about it.

So far they were not helpful. Just said read our website. The website is not very clear and they didn't want help clarify it. To find out if her $10k offer is renewable Soraya has to send them an email so I'm doing that now.
So they did not answer questions about fafsa?
Could you send me their number please

They said it is on the website but all I saw on the website were us gov loans requiring good credit. These are "direct loan" and "parent plus" loan which are apparently the new names for stafford loans.

I talked to fafsa. That was easier. They said that McGill determines how much gov loans she will get and Soraya has to contact them for that info. I hope we hear from them today in response to Sorayas email I sent for her (from her email account). The fafsa people said that normally McGill will send a letter with the entire aid package including loan info. I guess we didn't get that earlier because she didn't submit the app form until late.
I sent just now to McGill from Sorayas account a request that they email her the entire financial aid package today.
I received McGill s response and its not nearly enough money. I will send it to your email.
I did not receive the email
I sent it to your gmail
There is no info about the next step after the plus loan is rejected so call the financial aid office.
